article.title: AAI to Provide Laser Designator Kits for Shadow
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: AAI Corporation, Hunt Valley, Maryland, was awarded a $54,795,517 firm-fixed-price contract for the modification of an existing contract to procure laser designator retrofit kits for the Shadow unmanned aircraft system.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama is the contracting activity.
